conbody.p: To get started, follow these instructions to download and install the tutorial application. Then you will have the code set up so you can just follow along as you read through the rest of the tutorial.

li.p: Download Couchbase Server and install it. Make sure to install the beer-sample bucket when you run the wizard because this tutorial application works with it.
Clone the repository and install dependencies (Express and Jade):
li.codeblock: shell> git clone git://github.com/couchbaselabs/beersample-node Cloning into 'beersample-node' #... shell> cd beersample-node shell> npm install
shell> node beer.js Server running at http://127.0.0.1:1337/

li.p: In your web browser, navigate to http://localhost:1337/welcome, and enjoy the application!
